mosinstall.name: Bing Maps Bot
mosinstall.author: Nikos Vlachtsis
mosinstall.description:
By this free bot for Elxis CMS you can display embedded Bing Maps into content using the Bing Maps Service

Documentation source: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee692180.aspx

General Usage: {bingmaps}latitude_longitude,zoom,width,height,info{/bingmaps}

Example: {bingmaps}40.6259665_22.9484459,16,450,450,Lefkos Pyrgos - Thessaloniki{/bingmaps}

Notes:

1. Width has a min value limitation to 400 and Height to 200

2. Zoom accepts values among 1 and 19

3. Location info text is displayed under the map and you can let it even empty
